post.author: 이석준
post.content:
We have an opportunity that may be of interest to you. If you are interested and qualified for this opportunity, please apply online (link below). This submits your application for priority consideration on this opportunity. If this position is not a fit or if you are not currently available, perhaps you can refer a friend who could be a fit (link below).

Opportunity ID : 26503

Apply Online : https://www1.sisystems.com/index.cfm?mg=cpo.details&uv=%25%260%2FY1%2C0%20%0A
Refer a Friend : http://www.sisystems.com/index.cfm?mg=cpcanr.referral

Please note that we do *not* accept applications over the phone or by reply email.

Sourcing Office : Toronto
Title : VB .Net Developer
Project Description : Our client based in the west-end is looking for a seasoned VB .net Developer for a two (2) month contract.
The successful candidate will have the following skills:

- Development experience with VB .net and SQL 2000 and/or 2005.
- Experience in the financial industry.

Specialization and Skills :
    -  Software Development
          - .net   (5 - 7 years)
          - MS SQL Server   (5 - 7 years)


Start Date : Dec 01, 2009
End Date : Jan 30, 2010
Rate : Hourly  Negotiable


Thank you for your time and consideration Sean!

Best Regards,
Nancy Virgilio,
S.i. Systems Ltd - Toronto
post.title: VB .Net Developer - Rate : Hourly Negotiable
